text.autoconfig.minehop.title: Minehop Config
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.jHud.ssjH: SSJ X Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
SSJ Y Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.jHud.effi: Efficiency X Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
Efficiency Y Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.jHud.spee: Speedometer X Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
Speedometer Y Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.jHud.pres: Show Pre Speed (The speed you're going when you first left the ground)
Prespeed X Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
Prespeed Y Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.jHud.gaug: Show Gauge (Displays if you're strafing too quickly/too slowly.)
Gauge X Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
Gauge Y Offset (The values are percentages, 50 is centered).
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.nulls: Nulls (Uses the last key pressed as your sideways movement input instead of combining them)
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.client_va: Kick players that don't have the Minehop mod installed
text.autoconfig.minehop.option.record_ch: Discord Record Channel ID (optional, but required with a bot token)
